mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu ( MENU_TRUCK_ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_PRICE, MENU_DETAIL, IS_SIG_MENU, MENU_REG_DATE, MENU_IMG1, MENU_IMG2, MENU_IMG3) VALUES ( #{menuTruckId}, #{menuName}, #{menuPrice}, #{menuDetail}, #{isSigMenu}, SYSDATE(), #{menuImg1}, #{menuImg2}, #{menuImg3})

insert into optiongroup ( MENU_NO, OPTION_GROUP_NO, OPTION_NO, OPTION_GROUP_NAME, OPTION_NAME, OPTION_PRICE) values ( #{menuNo:INTEGER}, #{optionGroupNo}, #{optionNo}, #{optionGroupName}, #{optionName}, #{optionPrice} )
mapper.select: SELECT MENU_NO, MENU_TRUCK_ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_PRICE, MENU_DETAIL, IS_SIG_MENU, MENU_IMG1, MENU_IMG2, MENU_IMG3 FROM menu WHERE MENU_NO = #{value}
SELECT MENU_NO, OPTION_GROUP_NO, OPTION_NO, OPTION_GROUP_NAME, OPTION_NAME, OPTION_PRICE FROM ffin.optiongroup WHERE OPTION_NO = #{value}

SELECT o.MENU_NO, o.OPTION_GROUP_NO, o.OPTION_NO, o.OPTION_GROUP_NAME, o.OPTION_NAME, o.OPTION_PRICE, m.MENU_NO FROM ffin.optiongroup o, menu m WHERE o.MENU_NO = m.MENU_NO
AND o.OPTION_GROUP_NO = #{optionGroupNo}

SELECT MENU_NO, MENU_TRUCK_ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_PRICE, MENU_DETAIL, IS_SIG_MENU, MENU_IMG1, MENU_IMG2, MENU_IMG3 FROM menu
WHERE MENU_TRUCK_ID = #{menuTruckId}
